title: 21 May '14
author: Niharika (Bug reporting system)
content:
Sorry about the delay in this blogpost. I’ve been playing around with the streaming system since the last couple of days. Trying to figure out how components connect. My speed is a bit slow at the moment because I am new to Django. I did add a Report Bug button on the streaming system. It’s temporarily placed in the footer. Next I am trying to direct it to a new page where I fetch and display all relevant information. This is just for testing that I am going the right way. I will add all this information to a database once I make sure that I fetch all the right and necessary data.

Originally posted on Niharika Kohli
